response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it would be a perfect fit for you. We are offering this remarkable product at an exclusive price of $1,200,000. This special offer is designed to ensure that you receive unparalleled benefits while also maximizing the value we can provide. Should you choose to accept this offer, we guarantee a seamless transaction and excellent customer service throughout the process. Please let us know if you have any questions or require further information about the product. We look forward to the opportunity to serve you.", "product_price": 1200000}
